name: Good Cop, Rad Cop
description:
Gamepad Recommended! (360 suggested)

1 player

-Move with left stick

-At low speeds, press X to kick push

-Jump on rails to pick up speed

-Jump on ramps to ascend

-Hold down and press A to descend

-Get donuts for a speed Boost

-Catch that Kid

-If you need to exit during game, hit ALT-ENTER, then X out.
